meanings.definition: A cigar with both ends clipped off
meanings.sent1: Grandpa enjoyed smoking cheroots on the porch.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper displayed a variety of cheroots in the humidor.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue hidden inside the cheroot.
meanings.sent4: The cheroot stood proudly in the ashtray, a symbol of relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cheroot lingered in the room long after it was smoked.
